name: MIND HELLSCAPE VISUALIZATION
description:
NOW ENTERING, MIND HELLSCAPE VISUALIZATION . . .

Explore the art zone of the art of St. Juliana, with acrylic paintings, weird guys, and a noise soundscape composed for the space. 

THANK YOU TROPICAL CONTEMPORARY FOR THE RESIDENCY <3
During the current times of the pandemic, my goal was to create an art space that you can explore without fear of exposure to sickness. MHSV is my first Unity project, I hope you enjoy. <3
